Summary Note:
Savolainen Seppälä and the RM were introduced at a gourmet food festival in Helsinki. They shared a love for culinary arts and decided to explore investment opportunities in the food industry together.
Savolainen Seppälä is a 63 year old retired CEO from Finland. He has a diverse background, having worked in various capacities and gained extensive knowledge in the field.
After extensive research, he chose Julius Baer for its strong track record in managing high-net-worth clients.
Family Background: Savolainen Seppälä and Ella tied the knot in 1990. Together they have 2 kids called Järvinen and Aurora.
Education Background:
In 1981, Savolainen finished his secondary school education at Espoonlahden koulu.
After that, he went on to study at JAMK University of Applied Sciences until 1984.
Additionally, he went on to study at Metropolia University of Applied Sciences until 1988.
Occupation History:
Savolainen Seppälä is a seasoned professional with over 39 years of experience.
Savolainen Seppälä launched his career as a Aerospace Engineer at Finavia Corporation, where he gained valuable experience from 1986 to 1989.
His subsequent role was as a Program Manager at Finnair Oyj, where he continued to grow professionally from 1989 to 1992.
He spent 2 years working as a Director of Operations at Patria Aviation Oy, refining his expertise and building a strong network.
He worked as a VP of Business Development at Finavia Corporation from 1996 to 1999, playing a pivotal role in shaping the company's vision and strategy.
Until retiring, Savolainen Seppälä served as a CEO at Finnair Oyj, contributing significantly from 1999 to 2022.
Wealth Summary:
Throughout his career, he saved 1890000 EUR, investing in various assets to grow his wealth.
His remarkable portfolio comprises 3 stunning properties. Situated in prime locations across Kerava, Imatra and Lahti, these assets demonstrate their sophisticated understanding of real estate investments and high-end lifestyle preferences.
He does not have any inheritances.
Client Summary: Given the client's impressive career history and financial discipline, we are confident in his ability to achieve financial success and security.
